personal-profile.title: Personal Profile
personal-profile.content: I am a front-end web developer with knowledge about Git, Github and the terminal. Besides that, I have a high level of mastery in html, css and JavaScript. Currently I develop all my projects with React.js

content.project-description: The classic Arcade game made with plain JavaScript
project-content: Creation of 'smart' characters in order to make the game tricky
Interaction between two or more characters in the same space

content.project-description: A program able to solve linear equations
project-content: Algorithms at the moment to get the equation solved

content.project-description: Real time weather status all around the world
project-content: Use of mapbox to render interactive maps
Use of third parties' API's to get real time data
Shifting data from one component to other components and pages

hobbies.title: Hobbies
content: Reading - In 2020 I read 31 books and I am aiming to 50 this year
Running - In December 2020 I won the 'Christmas race' at my aunt's company. The prize was a 10kg turkey
